content:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/34940

I'd like to get some more basic examples of manifolds up. This PR shows that the graph of a continuous function on a C^n manifold has the structure of a C^n manifold by homeomorphism to the domain and that the inclusion in the ambient product space is C^m (for m â‰¤ n) iff the graph function is C^m.
